item.title: Analyst: ETH May Retrace to $3,350 Support in September, Start Rebound in October Towards New High
item.description: September 2nd. As per Cointelegraph, analyst Johnny Woo declared: "ETH might initially present a bearish outlook. However, if the trend unfolds as anticipated, this could potentially be the most significant bear trap I have ever witnessed."He further added that the chart suggests that ETH might form a "head and shoulders" pattern in September and then experience a breakout in an "October rally." In this situation, Ethereum could decline to around $3,350 as a support level in September and subsequently rebound in October, surging to a new all-time high in November.A comparable situation took place in September 2021 when ETH dropped by 30% from $3,950 to $2,750 only to rebound to a new all-time high in November.

item.title: Ethereum Short-Term Breakthrough of $4400
item.description: On September 2nd, based on HTX market data, Ethereum briefly exceeded $4400, and it saw a 0.26% increase in the past 24 hours.

item.title: European Central Bank Executive Board Member Schnabel: Central Bank Should Keep Rates Unchanged, Inflation Could Still Be Higher Than Expected
item.description: September 2nd - Fabio Panetta, who is a member of the Executive Board of the European Central Bank, expressed that the ECB should keep the interest rate at the present level. This stance is founded on the Eurozone economy's ability to withstand U.S. tariffs and the potential that the inflation rate might still be higher than anticipated. The ECB previously concluded a one-year period of loose monetary policy and is currently evaluating the comprehensive impact of the July agreement on U.S. tariffs to determine whether further interest rate cuts are required. Panetta is one of the most significant hawks at the ECB and holds the view that there is no necessity for additional rate cuts. The current policy rate of 2% may "moderately" stimulate the already vibrant economy. She stated: "I think we may have already implemented a slightly accommodative policy, so I do not perceive a reason for further rate cuts in the current circumstances." (FX678)

item.title: Metaplanet announces that the Special Shareholders' Meeting has passed resolutions, including increasing the authorized share capital, etc.
item.description: September 2nd: The publicly traded Japanese company Metaplanet announced that its extraordinary general meeting of shareholders has approved a resolution. This resolution encompasses an increase in authorized shares (to 2,723,000,000 shares), a location-independent shareholders' meeting (enabling fully online shareholder meetings), and the establishment of authorized share classes, namely Class A shares and Class B shares.

item.title: Binance Alpha will open Quack AI (Q) airdrop claim today at 15:00 UTC, with a minimum threshold of 220 points.
item.description: September 2nd, Binance Alpha will commence the claim process for the Quack AI (Q) airdrop at 15:00 UTC. Users possessing at least 220 Alpha points will be eligible to claim a first-come, first-served airdrop of 6000 Quack AI (Q) tokens. In the event that the rewards are not fully distributed, the point threshold will automatically reduce by 15 points every hour. Claiming the airdrop will result in the consumption of 15 Binance Alpha points.· Binance Alpha trading will become active at 15:00 UTC on September 2, 2025;· Binance Futures trading will commence at 15:30 UTC on September 2, 2025.

item.title: Analyst: Since Bitcoin broke $100,000 earlier this year, hodlers have been continuously selling their Bitcoin.
item.description: September 2nd: The Coindesk analyst Omkar Godbole pointed out that Bitcoin long-term holders, including those wallets that have remained inactive for many years, have been continuously selling ever since Bitcoin exceeded $100,000 earlier this year. Investors considered that the $100,000 Bitcoin price was too high and thus chose to realize profits, suggesting that the market might require some time to adjust to $100,000 as the new standard for Bitcoin. We are likely to continue to witness volatile trading in order to assist investors in gradually getting accustomed to this elevated valuation level.

item.title: After spending a day at a golf course near Washington, Trump has returned to the White House and pushed back against "critically ill" rumors.
item.description: On September 2nd, after spending a day at a golf course near Washington, President Trump of the United States returned to the White House and refuted the "critical condition" rumors.

item.title: Whale Accumulated 260,000 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 2nd, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented on-chain data indicating that within the past 24 hours, whales have amassed 260,000 ETH.

item.title: Market Movement Warning Sign? Hyperliquid Whale Activity Intensifies, with Single-day Large Transactions Exceeding 100 Million USDC
item.description: On September 2nd, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, Hyperliquid has once again witnessed multiple large deposits and withdrawals by whale-sized entities, as detailed below:Deposits:Address 0xEFd3 accumulated approximately 11 million USDC within a 24-hour period;Address 0xECB6 deposited around 46.69 million USDC during the same time frame;Withdrawals:Address 0x97E5 withdrew approximately 6.93 million USDC within 24 hours;Address 0x208d withdrew around 15 million USDC during the same period;Address 0x01d7 withdrew about 12.9 million USDC during the same time;Address 0x4016 withdrew 10 million USDC within the last 4 hours.The last similar large liquidity event took place during the week from July 30th to August 8th. During this period, the Bitcoin price dropped from nearly $120,000 to around $110,000 and then quickly rebounded, setting a new high of $124,457. item.title: GoPlus Launches EIP-7702 Attack Defense Solution, Providing Comprehensive Protection for User Fund Security
item.description: On September 2nd, Ethereum's EIP-7702 Protocol became a new focus of hacker attacks, resulting in losses exceeding $5.3 million. According to the analysis of the GoPlus Security Research Institute, the attacker carried out the theft through means such as signature phishing, malicious upgrades, and permission misuse.As one of the first platforms to pay attention to the security threats of this protocol, GoPlus has received requests for help from multiple users who were victims of theft and has completed multiple in-depth security studies. In order to protect the funds of Web3 users, GoPlus announced that the transaction simulation API now fully supports 7702 security checks, which can accurately intercept various malicious transactions based on EIP-7702. The security browser extension will also soon launch relevant protection features.GoPlus advises users to: keep abreast of security knowledge and raise security awareness; promptly use GoPlus security tools to protect themselves and
